class.rdfs:comment: A datasheet or vendor specification of a product (in the sense of a prototypical description).
class.rdfs:label: ProductModel

schema:isVariantOf.rdfs:comment: A pointer to a base product from which this product is a variant. It is safe to infer that the variant inherits all product features from the base model, unless defined locally. This is not transitive.
schema:isVariantOf.rdfs:label: isVariantOf

schema:predecessorOf.rdfs:comment: A pointer from a previous, often discontinued variant of the product to its newer variant.
schema:predecessorOf.rdfs:label: predecessorOf

schema:successorOf.rdfs:comment: A pointer from a newer variant of a product  to its previous, often discontinued predecessor.
schema:successorOf.rdfs:label: successorOf
